We wanted to help our students develop deeper friendships, build better relationships with their small group, and learn to be more critical about who they are letting pour into them. This three week series lead to great conversations in groups and saw groups grow closer together.

The big ideas we hit upon these three weeks were:

Week 1 - Your life will forever be impacted by who you let into your inner circle
Week2 - Jesus is the perfect friend
Week 3 - Your friends need a friend like Jesus.

Description:
Did you know that cats can make the same noise that the Predator makes when hunting? Another fun fact: if you were drowning, a cat would probably pour a bottle of water on top of you to speed up the process!

Name: FIxer Upper
Description:

Week 1 - Be obedient when God shows us needs.

Week 2 - Influence is not dependent on position

Week 3 - Know the real problem and be part of the solution

Week 4 - Just because it’s for God doesn’t mean its going to be easy.

Each week comes with a full manuscript, a detailed outline to make it helpful to make your own or give to a leader to make their own, a small group discussion sheet, and social media posts. This download contains all of that for all 4 weeks, in word and pdf formats.

Fearless
Description:
In the Christian life, we are not exempt to fear. And the Bible speaks often of how we should not fear for the multiple reasons that God gives us. This series will look at the fear we face in life, in our walk with Him, in evangelism, and other ways that fear can paralyze us. Living a faith that knows no bounds truly is possible, but it is only through following Jesus.

This is a four week series, complete with full manuscripts (.doc and .pages), sermon title and background slides (.jpeg and .psd).

Week 1 - The Beginning of Being Fearless
Week 2 - A Spirit of Fearlessness
Week 3 - Cowards
Week 4 - Boldly Proclaiming

Grace is something we may never fully fathom, but we can get a better grasp on it when we see how God gives out grace to those who don't deserve it. Sermons include these topics:

Wk 1: Jonah's Dilemma - Grace is undeserved
Wk 2: God's Heart - God is generously gracious
Wk 3: Our Response - Give grace to others

The download includes three sermon manuscripts, series graphics for HD screens and Instagram, as well as some ideas for how to decorate your stage through the series.

Name: Family Feud Game
Description:
Family Feud has been a huge hit for decades, and the gameplay is great for your next youth group. Have your students get in groups or “families.” Give them a piece of paper and pen, and away you go. Simply show the category and have them write what they believe to be their best answer. Then reveal the answers and have the groups add up their points. If they say “Bambi,” for instance, and “Bambi” got 44 votes, then they get 44 points. After 5 categories, the team with the most points wins.

Easy to play and sure to energize your next youth group.

This package includes the complete PowerPoint slide show, which is editable for your own context or so you can add your own questions.

We want to refuse to live as the world’s view of God and live for Jesus as He is.

Name: Esther - 4 Week Small Group Curriculum and Sermon Series
Description:
The name of God is never mentioned in the entire book of Esther, yet you can clearly see Him at work through the book. This 4 week Small Group Curriculum and 4 week Sermon series obviously complement each other perfectly, but they also can be used as stand alone studies.

Through these 4 week studies, your students will read through the book of Esther and gain an in-depth knowledge of the book, as well as important take aways for our lives today, from standing up for what you believe in and taking risks for God, to what it means to walk Humbly with Him.

Download this bundle today and know you've got a great month of lessons all taken care of for your ministry.

Name: Escape the Room guide
Description:
One of our favorite events with our youth ministry right now is escape the rooms. We did this one this fall as part of a larger event and it was a huge hit that no one could solve in time. It's church related, but it definitely wasn't lame, and our group (primarily unchurch kids) absolutely loved it.

<strong>PREMISE:</strong> Your group was voluntold to stay after service to help clean up after a birthday celebration in a Sunday School Classroom. When you walked into the classroom, the door closed behind you locking you in the room. Everyone else seems to have left the church. With no keys in sight, figure out how to get into the spare key box by unlocking the locks. Luckily, the custodians will be back in an hour to let you out if you can’t get out on your own.

This pack contains graphics to promote the event, as well as a complete guide/walk through for one escape room, including extra resources to print as props. There is leeway in how you set it up that will make it easier or harder, we're happy to answer any questions you may have.

Name: Ephesians: A Big Picture View
Description:
A 12-week teaching series through the book of Ephesians. If you are like me then you enjoy studying the Scriptures and teaching God's Word to students. However, not everyone enjoys putting together the big picture stuff. That's where Ephesians: A Big Picture View comes in. This resource is meant to be the everything you need to create an amazing teaching series but also allows you the flexibility to create your own individual lessons (there is a sample lesson provided).

Here's what this resource includes:
1. Curriculum-at-a-glance - breaks up the whole book of Ephesians into 12 teaching weeks that includes smaller units, lesson titles, Scripture, main points, biblical and systematic themes, and gospel-focused vocabulary.
2. An in-depth guide to all the major doctrines found in Ephesians including a more comprehensive list that lets you know where to find the biblical and systematic theology themes as well as the gospel vocabulary.
3. Unit Lesson Objectives for all 12 lessons - includes the objectives for the mind, will, and emotions.
4. Lesson Example - includes a sample of the teacher prep guide, the teacher study, and the lesson guide.
5. Resource list - this helps you dig more into Ephesians

Name: Envy
Endurance Game
Description:
In this game, Students are going to try to outlast their opponents to be the final player on the board. This is a great game for small or large groups, best played in a large flat area. With a large group, it is ideally played in teams, but it can be played as individuals. This game will get players moving around, interacting with each other, and you'll probably see some strategic thinkers emerge!

This download will explain how the basic game works, and then also provides two different “expansions” to make it replayable in different ways. You will need to provide your own supply of paper, as described in the download. Also included are the printable graphics for the expansions, and graphics for Slide Backgrounds and Facebook.

This is a great game for camp, youth group, or even to start a discussion on perseverance or wisdom.
Excerpt:
•	Be the last player standing on the changing board to win
•	Set up in a few minutes with the printables and some paper
•	Play as individuals or as teams
•	Variations are included for enhancing the game play
•	Includes a title slide

Name: Enchanted Woods Welcome Slide
Emo: 5 week sermon series
Description:
EMO:
The truth is, we do live from the inside out. We cut people down with our words because we’re angry. We question suicide because of our sadness. We judge others because of our disgust. We need God’s truth in each area of our emotions so that they don’t control us but rather we use them to make an impact on those we come into contact with for Jesus.

**This is a full message/student interview series. Each week an adult can interview a high school student that is or has wrestled with that specific emotion. Week 1 is an intro to the series with no interview and the following four weeks has questions for an interviewer to ask.**

Session One: Welcome to Your Emotions
Session Two: Anger
Session Three: Fear
Session Four: Sadness/Depression
Session Five: Disgust

This series includes:
- Title slide and a scripture slide
- Count down the days instagram pics (i.e. 3days until...) to build anticipation
- 3 instagram pics per session that is either a scripture or main idea from the previous session. It helps the message to stick throughout the week.
- Some weeks include prop ideas and/or worship elements
- Also Small group discussion questions

Name: Eggs Away
Description:
You got egg on your face... At least that's what you'll be saying after you play this game. In this video-driven game, you have to answer ridiculous trivia questions all about eggs. If the other contestant gets it right and you get it wrong, you have to grab an egg from the dreaded egg basket. Half the eggs are raw and the other half are hard-boiled. Whatever egg you pick, you must crack over your head, so there's a 50-50 chance that you'll be walking away messy.

What this product includes: 8 video questions, 8 video answers, 1 intro video, and a How-to-play pdf.

Name: Driven - Branding Package
Doubt | 3 week small group study
Description:
Students need space to have doubts, and this series helps facilitate that. So often, teenagers can feel like they need to keep their questions about God to themselves, or that any sort of doubt will be perceived as a sign of weak faith. But throughout the Bible, there are so many times when people in communication with God doubt him, and what we find is that through it, they grow their faith in amazing ways.

This 3 week small group curriculum will have your students and leaders take a look at 3 people in the Bible who doubted God, and help your students know that it's ok to have doubts, but it's not healthy to never wrestle with them. Your groups will be studying about doubting Thomas, and how Jesus responds to him, as well as Gideon doubting God's plans for his life and Sarah doubting God's ability to do what he says he will do.

Description:
Monotuned is a great screen based volunteer game that can also be used as a team game. Contestants are shown real lyrics from popular songs, which are read in as monotone of a voice as possible. Contestants have to correctly name the song these lyrics come from to win the round!

In the Disney version, all of the songs are, obviously, from Disney movies.

This download contains 10 question slides and 10 answer slides, PLUS a premade powerpoint with the game, so you can download it and play it right away!

Name: Discipleship Growth talks
Description:
This is a resource I've wanted to make for forever, and we finally got it done this year.

This is a resource designed to give your leaders tools for mentoring students. This specific pack is a 10 week pack of conversation guides to help students discuss faith and grow in their walk with God. These aren't lengthy discussion guides, but rather, a little bit of prep for leaders revolving around 1 question to discuss with a student in a one on one setting.

Now, 1 question may not seem like much, but it's designed to lead to further discussion. What we DIDN'T want was to have leaders sitting in starbucks with a stack of papers they are reading, never looking at the student. We aimed for one focus for the week that would give a general framework for the conversation, that is part of a larger plan to help move students from point A to point B in their spiritual Journey.

This resource is a great tool for your ministry, either as is or as a starting board for something else. It's reproducible and reusable over and over again and a great investment for any size youth ministry.

Name: Disciple: Defined - 4-week teaching series
Description:
Disciple: Defined is a 4-week series designed to help your students understand what it truly means to be a disciple of Jesus. A disciple is not just one who shows up to church now and then. A disciple is one who puts Jesus first, loves others, shares everything (including their time, talent, treasures, and testimonies), and is fruitful.

This series includes the following:

-Photoshop files (11x17 poster, HD image)
-PNG files (11x17 poster, HD image, Square image for social media)
-4 full manuscripts (Microsoft Word)
-Images (HD) with all Scriptures and main points for screens and social media

Name: Dinner Time
Description:
Students often mention that they want to study the Bible, but life, confusion, and busyness just get in the way. if you want a series to help challenge your students to dig into the Bible, this is a great launchpad to help them begin.

This four week series will challenge students to dig deep and seek to grow in their relationship with Christ by studying the Bible on their own. This is also a great series to kick off a Bible reading challenge for your students.

This series comes complete with full manuscripts (.doc and Pages) complete with illustration ideas, links to video suggestions, and message discussion questions built in. Editable (.psd) logo slides and background slides are included to help put together presentations in your software of choice.

So many doubt young people, that young people begin doubting themselves.

Description:
Celebrate Valentine's Day or any day by asking the question, 'Will it Chocolate?' This game takes ordinary treats and dips them in chocolate to see if they are even better as a chocolate version!

SUPPLY LIST

2 - Chocolate Fountain or Stove Top

Have your students taste these delectable treats and see if some of their favorite ordinary items are even better dipped in chocolate!

The slides come as jpegs and a PowerPoint file. You don't need a special program to run this screen game! I also included a psd file for those who want to add different items in and are able to edit in Photoshop!

Description: This download tackles difficult topic of dating when you are in middle school and high school. It attempts to answer some of the most popular questions around dating and how to go to battle for your heart (not theirs)!

Description:
The death of Jesus changes the outcome of everyone's history. This one-off sermon goes through some of the events that led up to Jesus dying on the cross, but also goes through what Jesus dying on the cross truly means. Students will get a better understanding of the impact of Jesus' death and how it changes them forever. This resource includes:

Description:
Dangerous Prayers is a four week sermon series that attempts to take students out of their comfortable requests before God to dangerously praying the greatest prayers in Scripture. We will be looking at four examples of prayer in Scripture and how, if these are adopted into our lives, they can be very dangerous. These prayers can be dangerous for our comfort, for our control, and for the plans that we have for our lives. In this purchase, you will receive:

- 4 word for word message transcripts
- WEEK 1 - Jacob’s Prayer

- WEEK 3 -The Disciple’s Prayer

Description:
We have all experienced the Christian Blahs at some point. We feel apathetic, distant from God, and we wonder how to get our spiritual fervor back. This series focuses on helping students find a way through the Christian Blahs. How can we find our way back to the passionate pursuit of Christ?

Name: Costume Party Bundle
CONNECTED
Description:
There is hardly a place we go today where we aren’t connected to something. Whether connected to our phone, computer, a particular app, or a boyfriend or girlfriend. We are constantly connected. This series will help us focus on making sure we are connected to the right things first.

This series contains 3 weeks of manuscripts for teaching students the importance of connecting with others, connecting with a greater purpose, and connecting with God.
Tags: Bible | Community | Connected | Great Commission | Plugged In | Sermon Series | The Word | Word of God

Name: Connect Card
Conflicting Views
Description:
Gather ten people in a room and ask them to give their views on a selection of topics and you will quickly hear ten different views on each topic. It’s not hard to find someone who has a conflicting view of something that you hold, but if you can’t then just go to comments on a YouTube video on that topic.

We are surrounded by a thousand different views, so what do we know what to believe? How do we determine who is right and who is wrong? Can we even be sure that we are right? In “Conflicting Views,” we teach on some of the hot button issues in our culture. Our hope is not to win an argument, but to know what Scripture says and to help formalize our beliefs amid conflicting views.

In this purchase, you will receive:

- Slides for every week (ppt)
- Graphics (psd/jpeg)
- Word for word manuscripts (19 pages)
- WEEK 1 - Racism
- WEEK 2 - Sexuality/Gender
- WEEK 3 - Truth

Disclaimer: There are many different views on these subjects, so I need to be clear that I am coming from a conservative reformed evangelical viewpoint on each subject. The inerrancy of Scripture is taught and the historical view of sexuality and gender is as well.

Name: Compari(sin)
Description: We all struggle with it: comparing. It's an epidemic we fight with, made more difficult by social media and constant connectivity. This 4-part series deals with the issues and dangers of comparison, and highlighting the truth of what God says in His Word.

Name: Community Why We Belong Together
Description:
What is the importance of community in our relationship with Jesus? In this series, you will go through why community matters and why we belong to each other in community. In this 3 week journey, we look at 3 different groups of friends that were a community together. After these three weeks, youth will have a greater understanding and hopefully want to grow in a deeper community. These messages are crafted by sermon points and sub-points so that you can make the message your own.

Week 1: Growing up together helps you grow together.
Week 2: The best communities of people look out for each other.
Week 3: Good communities go to the sufferer.

Included:
Title Slide for sermon
Background Slide for sermon
Social media graphics
3 Sermon outlines

Name: Come with Me Invite Card
Description:
Are you looking for a great way to encourage your students to invite their friends? Download this invite card! It's designed to be printed at VistaPrint or another service as a business card (front/back). Just upload it online and print away!

<strong>Download Contains:</strong>
Front &amp; Back Photoshop PSD file
Font folder

Must have Adobe Photoshop, Elements, or another compatible program to edit this file.

Name: Come Alive - Outreach Series - Jeff Evans
Description:
We fully intended for the Come Alive series to be an intentional outreach series, we wanted to encourage our current students to invite their friends and each week we would give a message that led them to Jesus and ended with a salvation call. We are a group of roughly 30 students, and through this series we had over 15 new students and 13 salvations (not all of the salvations were new students.) 15 new students was quite an increase for us! I imagine this number will scale based on the size of your group because of the number of students inviting friends. I'd love to hear from you to let me know how it worked for your group!

The package contains four weeks of messages, Facebook and Twitter cover photos, customizable and generic Snapchat GeoFilter, and a detailed report of how we got our students excited to invite their friends.

Name: Color Wars youth event invite card
Description:
Color wars have been a popular event the last few years, we are constantly seeing Youth Ministries use the powdered paint madness to kick off their school year or wrap it up. Our group is having one in a few weeks to help welcome 8th graders as a part of their freshmen transition, and we made these invite cards for everyone to hand out.

This download contains the announcment slide in photoshop format, as well as the invite card in photoshop format for you to completely customize.

*font not included.

Want more? We've got a whole <a href="https://youthmin.local:8890/2015/06/youth-ministry-color-wars/">event guide written up on how we do our color wars event for our youth group</a> on our blog.

Name: Color War Event Package
Description:
All you need to run your Color War event. Package includes:
-2 Different Editable Photoshop Graphics for the event
-Color War Event Guide (How to run the event, promotion ideas, FAQ's, and much more)
-Event Budget Worksheet
-Follow Up Sample Letter
-Pre-Event Checklist
-Sample Schedule

&nbsp;

Name: Clean Modern Resume Template
Description: Looking for a new Resume template to help you stand out when applying for jobs at churches? This editable template is killer, it’s got the modern look, with plenty of space to show off your skills, your passions, your education, and your accomplishments. The download is very well organized so that anyone with just a little bit of photoshop experience can edit it. We can’t guarantee you’ll get hired because of this Youth Pastor Resume, but we do know it will help your name stand out in the crowd.

Name: Clean Modern Business Card
Description:
Win yourself some free lunches by grabbing these beautiful business cards! I know it's easy to think we don't need business cards in this day and age, but then consider how often you wish you had something to hand to someone to help them contact you. You probably don't need thousands, but it's never a bad idea to have a few on you at all times.

This download pack contains 3 different design templates for unique business cards. The download comes in well organized PSD files that are easy to edit and customize, and help you connect with others.  All fonts used are free to download.

Name: Classic Calendar - Spring '17
CINE: Classic Comedies
Description:
To every comic book geek’s delight, the superhero’s popularity has taken flight in films and television. CINE: Superheroes looks deeper into three recent superhero movies (The Incredibles, Avengers: Age of Ultron, and X-Men: Days of Future Past) and one online TV show (Daredevil). CINE is designed for your youth group or small group, offering discussion questions, theological insights, and fun activities intended to help you and your group see Jesus in the latest superhero movies and TV shows.

Included Films

Avengers: Age of Ultron
Daredevil
The Incredibles
X-Men: The Days of Future Past
About Cine

Includes 4 film discussion guides, instructions, and two slide templates for PowerPoint, Keynote, MediaShout, ProPresenter or another display system.

Cine is a series of short, downloadable, curriculum resources. Whether you are looking for a last minute lesson plan or ideas to add into your teaching, Cine is designed for youth workers leading the revolution.

Name: Church Bulletin - Canva Template
Description: This product comes with a PDF with instructions on how to access your Canva template. Please follow the directions and you will be on your way to making your church bulletin look awesome!
Excerpt: Make your life easier with this ready to use church bulletin template that is made through Canva!

Name: Christmas Would you rather countdown video

Description:
This two-part Christmas series dives into the identity and meaning the gifts brought by the three wise men and three wise women surrounding the events of Christ's birth.

- Title slides
- Original PSDs

Name: Christmas trivia countdown
Christmas Trivia
Description:
Here's a great powerpoint game of trivia all about Christmas!

With a mixture of trivia questions about movies, Christmas Traditions, and how the holiday is celebrated around the world, this game will leave your students stumped and learning new truths about everyones favorite Holiday!

Download contains images for 11 questions, including slides for several questions that have two of the four choices removed. Plus, as always, we included a powerpoint filled with the game ready to go, so you can download this game and play it right away!

&nbsp;

Name: Christmas Through Time
Description: Christmas is an incredible time of the year, but have we heard the message of Christmas so much that we have grown cold to it. Use this one-off message to tackle the Christmas message from a different perspective using the Christmas Carol
Tags: charles dickens | christmas carol | Christmas through time | time travel

Name: Christmas Pollsters
Christmas Party Graphics and Event Guide
Description:
Get your students into the Christmas Spirit with this great new Event package for a Youth Group Christmas Party!

This download contains everything you need to promote your event, from Powerpoint slides, to Facebook Event Cover Images, to a handful of instagram sized images great for getting the word out and reminding students.

As an added bonus, we've included a Sample Event guide to use to make this event as easy to plan as possible! Just print and handout to your volunteers, and you'll be ready to go!

Name: Christmas Over Under Powerpoint Game
Description: Super fun game just in time for Christmas. Each question will have a random numerical answer that is either over or under the real amount. Your student have to guess if it is over or under. Images and PPT file included!

Name: Christmas Motion Transitions
Description:
Its the most wonderful time of the year, and you need to show it! Use these motion transitions to make your service look smooth.

Animations included: Welcome, Game Time, Announcements, Offering, Small Groups, See You Next Week, and a 3 Minute Countdown.

*Bonus* We've included a bonus folder of the animation videos with no background. Slap a Luma Key filter on them, and put whatever background you want on them.

Name: Christmas Jeopardy
Description:
The classic television gameshow arrives at your group's Christmas party in this easy to play game. This game works with big and small groups! All files are editable, so you are able to customize questions that fit your group! The file includes jpeg slides, ppt, and keynote files! All of the questions and answers are written out for you in a word document for you to print out and follow along! Get your Alex Trebek impression ready, because this is the perfect game for your Christmas party!

<strong>DOWNLOAD INCLUDES</strong>
PowerPoint File
Keynote File
Export jpegs that are ready to go!
Question/Answer document

Name: Christmas Announcement slides
Description: This pack of announcement slides features great slides for all the christmas season fun you're group will be having! Includes slides for christmas party, gift exchanges, christmas in the city events, christmas eve services, all in editable formats and as prepared images you can add dates on top of in any program and use.

Name: Christianity Revisited
Description:
Over the past couple months I have developed a burden to end what I am referring to as Sunday Christianity. I am tired of seeing Christians show up for church on Sunday then act as if church is over, act as if they themselves are not the church. Christianity is about more than showing up to a building one day a week.

In this message, my goal was to show my students a quick glimpse of what true Christianity looked like in the book of Acts and then show them stories of it being lived out in everyday lives of normal people. I ended with a challenge, challenging them to seek God in prayer and in His Word.

Overall, this message was well received and I have witnessed changes in some of their actions. I pray this one-off lesson will serve as a good challenge lesson for all of you out there.

You can check out more of my stuff at: https://youthmin.local:8890/vendor/th3pr1de/

Name: Chosen sermon series graphics package
Choices: 2 Week Sermon Series
Description:
In Matthew 7, Jesus preaches one of the greatest sermons as he pulls no punches as to what it means to follow Him. In it, he talks about the choices that we face. This series seeks to take a closer look at two of the choices that we have set before us: two roads and two voices and how we as Christ followers should respond.

This series comes with complete manuscripts and graphics ready to go for you to teach.
Excerpt:
Two fully editable manuscripts (.doc and Pages)
Fully editable graphics
Background and title slides
Suggested illustrations and slides
Tags: choices | Matthew 7 | Sermon on the Mount | sermons
Notes:
Thanks for your purchase. 50% of all proceeds from the sales of my products is donated directly to Mountain Faith Mission of Haiti. 

If you love the product, I'd love for you to leave a review in the marketplace!

Name: Children's Ministry Information Card
Cheez It Stack It
Description: It's hard to find a game that can come down to the wire and build suspense/energy in the room. Cheez It Stack It is a GREAT game for just that though! This game also comes with a custom one-minute countdown to make everything that much better!
Tags: challenge | funny game | suspenseful | upfront game

Name: Cheese or Pokemon?
Description:
How well do you know your Cheese?
How well do you know your Pokemon?
Think you can guess which is which?

Included in this download is the PowerPoint Presentation with 10 'Cheese or Pokemon' questions, as well as the Title Slide and all question and answer slides in .PNG format. This game is download and play ready!

Name: Charge!
Central
Description:
Central is a sermon series through the entire book of Galatians. This series will challenge students to see that their lives must be centred on the gospel. Each week's message is a highlight from a key theme in the chapter that Paul wrote to the Galatians. Students will see the theme of the gospel written to the Galatian church in this book and how it relates to them now in their context.

Week 1
Galatians 1 - As gospel Centred Christian’s we respond to the Gospel, centre our lives around the gospel and live the gospel every day of our lives.

Week 2
Galatians 2 - As gospel Centred Christian’s we literally give ourselves away to God when Jesus comes to live in us.

Week 3
Galatians 3 - Gospel Centred Christian’s don't live by rules, they live by faith. Their righteousness is not in their ability to carry out a list of do’s and don’ts, it’s in the person of Jesus.

Week 4
Galatians 4 - We are all in need of a saviour and the law points to the answer which is the gospel. Those who respond to the gospel are made sons of God are baptized into Jesus as a sign of the new covenant.

Week 5
Galatians 5 - Gospel centred Christian’s keep in step with the spirit of God and serve one another in love.

Week 6
Galatians 6 - Gospel centred Christian’s sow spiritual seeds and do good to other gospel centred Christian’s

This resource includes:
Six complete word-for-word message manuscripts (Word documents)
Powerpoint presentations for each weeks lesson
Images (series title, verse slides, Instagram)
Small group discussion guides for your leaders

Name: Cause & Effect sermon series
Tags: Character of God | Sermon Series | small groups

Name: Car Wash Fundraiser Kit
Description:
Doing Youth Group Fundraisers is something that most Youth Pastors is accustomed to, and we're always looking for easier ways of doing it. One of the most commonly done fundraisers with any group of teens is a car wash, but how often do you spend hours upon hours preparing for one, spending the money on the tools to do it, and corral teens for a few hours to actually wash the cars, all to end up with only a few hundred bucks.

With a car wash-a-thon, you can guarantee an increase in your return. We used this method recently with only 13 students, and made over $7500! We can't guarantee you'll make that much, but we do know, this is one of our favorite fundraisers.

Name: Captain America or Iron Man
Description:
With the rivalry of Captain America and Iron Man, do you know which hero said a certain quote? Test your Avenger knowledge and see if you can guess which hero says what! This resource includes:
– 10 (and 1 bonus) Q/A game images
– Ready-to-go PowerPoint

Name: Camp Theme Pack - ONE
Camp / Retreat Starter Pack
Camera Roll Scavenger Hunt Game
Calling
Description:
The question of our calling -- what God specifically created each of us to do -- has plagued generation after generation. In this two part series, we go over the two calls we each hear in our life, and learn how to ensure we hear God's call, versus our own.

Series includes:
- Sermon text in Google Docs and Microsoft Word formats
- Title slides
- Original PSD files

Name: Call of Duty: Spiritual Warfare
Description:
Like traditional warfare, spiritual warfare requires armor, weapons, and tactics. But why did Paul describe the Armor of God the way he did? In this one-off message, we will discuss the Armor of God, what it means, and why that particular piece of armor was chosen for Paul's illustration.

Sermon includes:
- Sermon text in Google Docs and Microsoft Word format
- Title slide
- Original PSD
- Photo of the Baron Manfred Albrecht Freiherr von Richtofen (used for illustration)

Name: Cafe Menu
Description: Does your ministry have a cafe that could use an awesome looking menu to help promote the sale of your stuff? This is an awesome, graphically engaging and fun poster sized file that can be customized to fit any need or want!

Name: BuzzWords Youth Ministry powerpoint game
Description:
BuzzWords is a fantastic group game your students will love, whether you have a group of 2 or 200. For detailed instructions on how to play the game, you can visit the <a title='Youth Group game powerpoint' href='https://youthmin.local:8890/youth-group-powerpoint-game-buzzwords/'>games section of YouthMin.org</a>.

This download contains 20 slides (10 different ones, but coming in both 4x3 and 16x9 resolutions) for you to add to you presentation software. It also includes a title slide and a photoshop file to create matching slides of your own.

Name: Buzz Words volume 2
Description:
One of our most popular downloads since we first released it is a game called BuzzWords, and now after several months, we've got more great slides to keep this game going!

The great thing about Buzzwords is that both volumes have more slides than you'll use in one week, since each round needs a few minutes to allow teams to come up with their ideas, and then to compare lists so no doubles are counted. Further instructions on how to play are included in this download, along with 10 brand new slides and a powerpoint presentation preloaded with the game slides so you can use this instantly!

Name: But If Not
Description:
In Scripture, there are statements made on conditions. If 'X' happens, then 'Y' will happen. BUT IF NOT...something else will happen. Some of these statements stick out as great challenges to teenagers today. How will they respond when life doesn't turn out the way they thought it would? How can they know and accept God's plan? Are they willing to follow God, to the point of desperation for His presence?

This three week series will challenge your students to look at who God is and follow Him no matter what the cost.

There are three fully editable manuscripts (Pages and doc format) that are customizable for your group. Suggested illustrations and discussion questions are built into the manuscripts. Editable title slides are included in .psd format, or ready to go images in .jpeg format for your presentation.

Week 1 - Obeying in the Fire (Daniel 3)
Week 2 - The Importance of Presence (Exodus 33)
Week 3 - Take This Cup (Matthew 26)
Excerpt:
Three fully editable manuscripts (.doc and .pages)
Fully editable title and background slides (.psd and .jpeg)
Suggested discussion questions
Suggested illustrations
Suggested presentation cues

Week 1 - Obeying in the Fire (Daniel 3)
Week 2 - The Importance of Presence (Exodus 33)
Week 3 - Take This Cup (Matthew 26)

Name: Building Healthy Relationships with Leadership
Build Your Life Sermon Series
Description:
Today's world has us competing for so many different things to build our lives upon. Whether it is image, popularity, athletics, academics, or any of the other million things our students are facing today, there is deep competition for our lives. But Paul, in the book of Colossians challenges a group of believers who were hearing many of the same messages we hear today. And his response? Build you life on Jesus.

This five week sermon series will challenge your students to examine ALL parts of their lives and build their life on Jesus.

This series comes with fully editable manuscripts in both Apple Pages and Microsoft Word formats. Title and Background Slides are included in jpeg format, as well as a fully editable .psd of the Title slide. In the manuscripts, slide suggestions, some illustrations and introductions are also suggested.
Excerpt:
Five fully editable manuscripts in Pages and .doc
Title and Background slide (editable .psd included)
Slide suggestions in manuscripts
Illustration ideas
Tags: build | Colossians | Jesus | life on jesus | who is jesus
Notes: Thank you so much for your purchase! 50% of the proceeds from all of my products are donated directly to Mountain Faith Mission of Haiti. If you have any issues, please feel free to reach out to me at ryanakers@me.com. If you love it, please leave a review in the marketplace!

This download contains photoshop files to completely customize the brochure, business card, and Facebook timeline cover.

Description:
This package contains 7 slides to help welcome students to your services. It's a great free download that can be imported right into powerpoint, pro presenter, proclaim, whatever presentation software you use, and simply provides great looking backgrounds.

This download contains 7 slides that are 16x9 ratio in .png form, including 3 with titles already (Welcome, Welcome to HSM, Welcome to MSM) and 4 blank slides to add your own title to, use as a background for worship, or use as the background during your preaching time.

Name: BreakEven Budget
BrandWars
Description: If you like games like <a href="http://www.superfightgame.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SuperFight</a> you will love this! This is a fun upfront game that involves debating. Five round of having students come up front to argue why their brand is better. A panel of judges of your choosing (typically volunteer leaders) determines the winner. After five rounds, the team with the most victories win.

Name: Brandless Brands
Description:
This powerpoint game is great for a series or talk on influence, but it's also just a fun game to quiz your students for anytime of the year.

In this game, students will see colors (and maybe a shape) from some of the most recognizable brands, colors that they would see probably on a daily basis. They must correctly identify the brand that is associated with the colors on the screen.

Download contains 11 rounds of clues and answers, all as individual images to quickly load into a presentation software like pro presenter or sidekick, but it also comes as ready to go powerpoint, so you can download and play it right away!

Name: Bourne to Die: The Jesus Legacy Teaching Series (5-Week)
Boss Ross Or Diana Ross
Description:
Do you know the different between Bob Ross and Diana Ross quotes? Test your ability to know the difference your favorite painter and the notorious singer. This game of 10 questions will challenge your knowledge of Bob Ross and Diana Ross quotes.

Includes in this game:
• PowerPoint
• 10 Questions and Answers [JPG and PPT]
• Instruction Slide – strike a pose of each character
• 1 Tie Breaker Question and Answer [JPG and PPT]
• 1 Blank Slide [JPG and PPT]

How to use this product:
Play this game in PowerPoint or other software using the JPG images.

Head to Head: This game can be played head to head where two (or more) students go against one another until one wins the game. Strike a pose to guess your answer (poses are included on the instruction slide – Bob is painting, and Diana is singing).

Graphic Logo Information:
Presentation [16x9 – 1920x1080]. Font: Noteworthy and Helvetica Neue.

Notes: Thank you so much for purchasing this product! I hope this product blesses your ministry like it did in mine!

Name: Bold Fall Calendar
Description:
Help your students and families know about upcoming youth ministry activities with this great editable calendar template. What makes this calendar template great is it comes ready to edit in both photoshop form and in Microsoft Word, so anyone can customize it to their group!

Take the printed calendar even further with the included social tools. We've included 5 instagram story-covers to focus on fall events, or monthly activities, and to give to the church instagram to tie in this branding.

This calendar is a whole pack of great resources to help you strengthen your communications this coming semester.

Name: BOLD Church
Description:
This 6-part series through the beginning of the book of Acts details the BOLDNESS of the people who made up the early church. They lived bold lives for Jesus Christ, and we can too!

Download contains 6 message transcripts, sermon slide images to use in your presentation software, promotional Facebook page header and instagram image, and instagram image background for series posts.
Tags: Apostles | Bold Church | Boldness | Early Church | Sermon Series

Name: Bold Calendar spring 2019
Description:
Help your students and families know about upcoming youth ministry activities with this great editable calendar template. What makes this calendar template great is it comes ready to edit in both photoshop form and in Microsoft Word, so anyone can customize it to their group!

Take the printed calendar even further with the included social tools. We've included 5 instagram story-covers to focus on fall events, or monthly activities, and to give to the church instagram to tie in this branding.

This calendar is a whole pack of great resources to help you strengthen your communications this coming semester.

&nbsp;

Name: Bold 3 Week sermon series
Description:
God does not call Christian's to live timid lifes of trying to blend in, but he calls us to be bold in our thoughts and actions. Over three weeks, we'll look at 3 people from the Old Testament who took bold action to do what God wanted them to do.

Week 1 we'll learn about Ruth in a message to helps explain our need for salvation.

Week 2 we'll learn about Hosea in a message that calls us to greater love.

Week 3 we'll learn about Gideon and having confidence in God.

This download contains a series overview and each week comes with a detailed outline to help you craft and shape the message to be your own. There are no transcripts, but you have everything you need to fill in the blanks and craft these messages. <a href="https://youthmin.local:8890/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/Week-1-Sermon-Notes.pdf">Here is a sample of what we mean.</a>

Also included in this download is series artwork and a 5 minute countdown branded for the series.

Name: Bob Ross Ultimate Game
Description:
<em>This resource is also part of YouthMin.org's Ultimate Youth Ministry bundle! While you're more than welcome to purchase this resource individually, you can grab it as part of our massive resource pack that saves over 94%! Grab this, and an additional 100+ resources!</em>

Bob Ross is an icon that will always be remembered for his funny sayings and crazy afro. Introduce your students to Bob Ross by asking some of the craziest trivia questions and quotes from his life!

DOWNLOAD INCLUDES
Game Slides (JPEG, PPTx)
Photoshop files for you to make your own slides

Name: Block Party Flyer
Description:
Download this fantastic 8.5 x 11 template flyer for your next Block Party. The template comes with the graphics &amp; fonts used.

<em>Adobe Photoshop, Elements, or another compatible program must be used to edit the .psd file. Cube colors are not editable.</em>

Name: Blessed Sermon series
Description:
We use the word blessed a lot...and maybe we even overuse it. But when the Bible speaks of someone being blessed, it looks a lot different than our shallow definition in today's society. This three week series will unpack different uses of the word blessed in the Bible, as we understand that it is more than just being lucky or having things, but it is being in deep relationship with Jesus Christ and trusting Him with everything.

This package comes complete with full manuscripts in both .doc and .pages format. Each manuscript comes with discussion questions, presentation cues, and illustration ideas where applicable. Series title slide and background slide for presentation are also included in .jpeg format.
Excerpt:
Three fully editable manuscripts (.doc or .pages)
Logo and background slides (.psd and .jpeg)
Suggested discussion questions
Suggested illustration ideas

Name: Blessed.
Description:
It's easy to feel like we have nothing when we are surrounded by a culture that is constantly screaming MORE, MORE, MORE! But the truth is that the things of this earth are not what make our lives 'blessed', and even the material things that are nice to have are given to us for a reason.

Over three weeks in this series, you'll look at what makes us blessed, how we don't earn blessings from God, he freely gives them, and lastly, how God blesses us so that we can bless others.

This download contains a series outline with bottom lines and scripture help, as well as the graphic package to teach through it.

<strong>Although almost all of our sermon series are full transcripts, this is one we intentionally made as an outline. We've found most youth </strong><b>workers appreciate having a general direction to fill in with their own stories, and our outline series work great to give to volunteers to be able to preach.</b>

Name: Blank Space + Free Game
Description:
Love is _________.

How you fill in that space tells a lot about a person. Who you listen to says a lot about how you'll fill it in. The students in our Youth Ministries get a lot of messages on what love is from the world around them, what are they getting from the church?

This 5 week (easily 6 week) series takes a look at 5 statements with blank spaces that students must decide between how the world fills them in, or how God fills them in. These statements cover issues like the above, what is Love, as well as taking a look at God's view of dating, God's idea for sex, and what we should look for in who we date/marry if we wish to Honor God. We did extensive Biblical Research to prepare these messages, we hit tough topics and difficult conversations head on, and we draw some clear lines between what the world offers and what God's word says.

This package contains 5 weeks, each with a message transcript and a full discussion guide for break out groups/small groups after the lesson. We did this as a 6 week series with a Relationship Panel as week 6, so that's how you make it a 6 week series, but we can't make our panelists downloadable, so you only get 5 weeks.

As an added bonus, you get our files for playing the Whisper Challenge game, which we did on week 1. We used this series to play several Battle of the Sexes games, most of which can be found here on YouthMin.org!

Name: Birthday Postcard 5 Pack
Description:
Download this pack of 5 ready to go postcards. These are free of any branding so you don't need to change them to fit your group, but this download also comes with the original files to be able to add any branding or extra message you'd like!

Download contains:

5 Birthday Postcards (6'x4') in .png format

5 Birthday Postcards (6'x4') in .psd (photoshop) format

***Does not contain any fonts used, those are sold seperately on various sites.

Name: Big September Bundle
Big Prayer Bigger God
Description:
We know that God has the power to do anything, but too often, we fail to pray to Him as though He can. Whether we are paralyzed by fear of unanswered prayers, or simply just don't have the faith that He really is powerful, we miss the opportunity to pray to God in the way He should be prayed to. This four-week series will examine four men of the Old Testament and their prayer lives with God. We'll be challenged, not so much in learning how to pray, but how we should live as we follow God and talk to Him.

Includes 4 fully editable manuscripts complete with content, illustration ideas, discussion questions within the lesson, and cues for presentations/slides. Also included are the series title slide and background slides in .jpeg format.

Name: Big Game Trivia
Tags: American Football | Football | Fun | School | Sports | Super Bowl | SuperBowl | Up Front Games

Name: Big Entrance Message
Description:
This lesson is about the Triumphal Entrance of Jesus Christ and can be used for your group at any time! Naturally, this would be a great lesson for Palm Sunday and comes with an additional Palm Sunday logo slide.

Palm Sunday – Large Group Manusrcipt (1,500 words/4-pages)

Mark 11:1-11

'In our service this weekend, our hope is that every student gets a picture of what Jesus' big entrance looked like and understands that Jesus is in complete control and alone saves.'

This download comes with the series graphics and the 4 page word-for-word manuscript.

This is a great lesson for a large group teaching time and could easily be adapted for a small group lesson!

Name: Between The Waves
Description:
5 week small-group study on the book of Jonah. This study is simple, easy to follow for both students and leaders, and will deeply challenge your students to take the next step in being obedient to God's voice and commands. With a little bit of addition, this resource could turn into a 5 week sermon series. 

This resource includes:
- 5 complete weeks of small group leader guides
- Introduction to the book of Jonah
- Powerpoint/Instagram title slide

Name: Best Year Ever sermon series
Description:
This 3 week sermon series takes a look at simple ideas that if we apply to our lives will help make this year our best ever. It’s a great series to kick off a new school year or use in January with the clear challenge that these ideas should become priorities in this new endeavor.

This download contains a great series outline brief, along with individual outline sheets for each week, giving you more than enough to fill in the blanks with your own voice to craft a message for your students. It comes with several graphics to use across social media and in person, as well as a great 5 minute countdown video themed with the rest of the graphics.

Name: Believe.
Description:
We use the word 'believe' all the time when it comes to our relationship with Christ. But, is it possible that maybe our belief is not the same as what it should be when we read what Jesus said?

The book of John sets out to prove that Jesus is the Son of God so that people may believe. This six week series will look at the topic of belief throughout the book of John.

Week 1: Believe and Receive
Week 2: Not Just John
Week 3: Obey
Week 4: Fulfillment
Week 5: Springs
Week 6: Others

Throughout this series, your students will be challenged to question why they believe what they believe, and if that belief makes an impact in their lives.

This sermon series comes complete with fully editable manuscripts in both .pages and .doc format. You'll also include widescreen title slide, three background slides for your slides, and two social media graphics free to use.

&nbsp;

<em><strong>But Wait! This resource is also part of YouthMin.org's Ultimate Youth Ministry bundle! While you're more than welcome to purchase this resource individually, you can grab it as part of our massive resource pack that saves over 94%! Grab this, and an additional 100+ resources!</strong></em>

Name: Beach Party Games
Description:
Here’s a set of games for your next 'beach party' themed night at youth group, camp, or that winter retreat that needs some sun &amp; surf! Download a Spotify playlist of 60’s surfer music, decorate for the beach, get some beach-towels, flip-flops and sunglasses for prizes and you’re ready to run some beach party games! This download will instruct you how to play 5 BEACH-THEMED GAMES at your next event!

This download will explain how each game works, and then also provide several variations for these games so you can customize them to your group's needs. You will need to provide your own supplies for each game, from sand &amp; gummy sharks to pool noodles to inflatable pool rafts! Games range from up front games with a few participants to whole-group participation in some wide games. You can play these games in your youth room, a gym, your auditorium, or outside!

This is a great set of games for camp, youth group, or even as part of a discussion of John 21!

BATTLE ROYALE!
Baptism T-Shirt Design Bundle
Baptism Certificate
Description:
Do you need an updated design for your baptism certificate? Download this file compatible with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Elements, and any program capable of handling Adobe .PSD files. Fonts are included and colors can be changed to whatever scheme you would like. Designed to fit horizontal 8.5 x 11 paper. Download this fantastic Certificate of Baptism today!

Files Included: .PSD Photoshop File &amp; Fonts

Name: Baptism Bundle
Banner Stand
Banana for Scale
Description:
We probably all know how long a football field is.

100 yards = 300 feet = 3,600 inches

But that doesn't help us see it's size at full scale, and for that, there is only one unit of measurement that is universally accepted - Bananas.

In this game, students must deduct how tall or long a famous thing is using bananas. For instance, the average banana length is 7 inches, and Russell Wilson is 5'10", or 70", therefore, Russell Wilson is 10 bananas long.

This download contains 11 rounds of questions, with 3 slides for each round, all as individual slides for you to quickly load into presentation software such as pro presenter or sidekick. It also comes preloaded as a powerpoint, so you can download and play today!

Name: Baking Bread
Description:
Bread is often one of the first things that come to mind when talking about food. Bread is mentioned over and over again in the Bible as examples of food, or even Christ describing Himself as the Bread of Life.

In this four-week series, each of the four steps in baking bread is discussed in terms of what it means for our lives as believers.

Series includes:
- Sermon text in Google Docs and Microsoft Word formats
- Title slide for each sermon
- 'Threshing' MP4 for session 2's illustration
- Original PSD

Name: Baewatch Series Graphics
Description:
Are you looking for a funny yet relevant graphic for your next purity or relationship talk? Look no further than to Baewatch. Don't worry! I saved you from looking at the 'Hoff's'ξhairy chest. You're students will love the concept of talking about Bae.

<strong>Included:</strong>

Main Title Graphics (.psd)

Text Graphics (.psd)

Instagram Graphics (.psd)

This download contains Adobe Photoshop files, which you will need (or a similar program) in order to edit.

Name: Bad Math
Description:
How can Jesus be both man and God? Do we really lose anything if He is half of both?

Understanding who Jesus is, is one of the most critical things for teenagers to study. Jump into this one-off message with the purpose of providing your students a deeper understanding of who Jesus is and why it matters that He is 100% God and 100% man.

Are you looking to make planning your camp, retreat, or D-Now as simple as possible? Look no further than Bad Ideas.

This package comes complete with everything you'll need to successfully pull off an awesome themed retreat or camp with your students.

Looking at the story of Israel in 1 Samuel, we are able to examine the mistakes and decisions of the people of Israel, and see why those bad ideas should not be repeated in our lives.

Four fully editable manuscripts (Pages or Word)
Fully editable title and background slides for presentations

Name: Backwards Blessings
Description:
Take your students through eight weeks of the teachings of Jesus.

The Beatitudes are the beginning of the greatest sermon ever preached by the greatest preacher to ever live, but what do they actually mean? This eight-week series dives into each of the Beatitudes, discussing what they actually mean and what role they play in our ultimate goal of becoming more like Christ.

Series contents:
- Eight word-for-word manuscripts (about 1,500 words each)
- Messages in Google Docs and Microsoft Word formats
- Title slides for series and for each individual message

Back to Basics
Description:
If we want our students to witness to their classmates, then we need to make sure they're prepared to answer some of the basic questions that tend to pop up. This four-week series discusses one question each week and answers it with both historical and scriptural references.

The questions discussed in this series are:
I. How can we trust the Bible?
II. How do you know there is a God?
III. Don't all religions lead to the same God?
IV. How can a good God allow so much pain and evil?

Name: Auto Complete 2
Description:
It's pretty amazing how google has a system to auto complete search queries as soon as you type one letter. But isn't it always interesting to see the crazy questions people most often search for as you go through with typing out your search?

In Auto Complete, we show you the beginning of a search phrase, and 5 possibilities that google auto completes. The catch is the 4 of them are real, while we made up the 5th one. Players must correctly identify which one doesn't belong to get the point.

This download comes with 11 rounds of question and answer, and it contains them in individual images to throw into pro presenter, as well as coming with a powerpoint version loaded up, so you can download and play this game with your youth ministry right away!

&nbsp;

<em>This resource is also part of YouthMin.org's Ultimate Youth Ministry bundle! While you're more than welcome to purchase this resource individually, you can grab it as part of our massive resource pack that saves over 94%! Grab this, and an additional 100+ resources!</em>

The Asking for a Friend series is designed to tackle the tough questions that students are asking about faith, God, the Bible, and the church. The series works through the following questions:

-Can I trust the Bible?
-Is Jesus the only way to heaven?
-Why does God allow suffering?
-If I love God, why do I need the church?
-Why does God make so many rules?
-Does God care about who my friends are?
-What does the Bible say about sex?
-What does it mean to follow Jesus?

This series includes the following:

-8 weeks of lesson - full manuscripts (Microsoft Word and PDF)
-8 weeks of small group lessons (Pages and PDF files - 8-10 cards for students to work through)
-Photoshop files (11x17 poster, HD image) for editing

Name: A Faith That Never Fails Sermon Series
Description:
<p style="margin-bottom: 1.7em; margin-top: 0px; color: #666666; font-family: 'Work Sans', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Peter made many mistakes during his time on earth. We're able to point to his life and see things to avoid. But in his letters to believers, Peter was a different man. He was bold and focused on taking the Gospel to all people and encouraging them in their faithfulness to Jesus. This two week series looks at 2 Peter and what it takes to have a strong faith, both depending on Christ to work in and through us, as well as our response to Him.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 1.7em; margin-top: 0px; color: #666666; font-family: 'Work Sans', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">This two week series comes with fully editable manuscripts in both Word and Pages format with suggested slides, illustrations, and other elements you’ll need. Title and background slides are also provided.</p>
Excerpt:
Two Weeks from 2 Peter
Fully editable word-for-word manuscripts
Illustration ideas
Slide prompts
Presentation Backgrounds
Notes:
Thanks for your purchase! If you love it, please leave a review in the marketplace.
With your purchase, 50% of the proceeds is donated directly to Mountain Faith Mission of Haiti to make a difference in the lives of students in Haiti!

Name: 6 Day Mission Trip Student Devotional Booklet
Description:
This 6 Day Mission Trip Student Devotional is unique in the sense that it is not specific to any group, location, activity, or denomination. It is a 6 day devotional tool written with the goal of being relevant to anybody who reads it. In fact, I didn't even write this for my own group at all, but was commissioned by the local association to write this devo for different groups of diverse teams that would come in to different locations and do different mission tasks. So there will be very little to no 're-writing' required on your part!

Included in this download is the devotional in WORD format with booklet covers ready to go for North America, Central/South America, Africa, Asia, and Europe/Middle East. Also included in the 'READ ME' file is simple instructions on how to print this in booklet form, and how to personalize the booklet cover.

The files are not automatically in 'ready-to-print' booklet form because I wanted to leave them editable just in case you needed to make any quick changes before printing.

I hope this resource is a blessing to you and your group. God bless you on your Mission Trip!

Name: 5 game pack
4Twelve Branding Logo
Description:
Looking for a fresh take on the 4Twelve logo? Looking to rebrand your ministry? Want a fun logo with a relevant message? 4Twelve stands for 1 Timothy 4:12 that says 'Don’t let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith and in purity.'

This package comes with the following:

Illustrator logo file
JPEG logo file (Both colors)
PNG logo file w/ transparent background (Both colors)
T-Shirt Mockup

<em>*Must have Adobe Illustrator to edit this file or another program that edits .ai files. </em>

PRE-ORDER NOW AND SAVE! Normally $75!
We believe that a solid foundation of Theology is a critical component to help students develop in our Student Ministries. We try and ensure that every message we deliver, or every discussion our small groups have, contains plenty of doctrine in a way teenagers can hold on to.

But, we also know that a student could hear every sermon and be in every small group and still not grasp the entirety of doctrine. So we developed a year long class for students to go through that would lay out doctrine in a way that makes it important for them, easy to understand, but ultimately, helps them know what they believe.

We use this class as a sort of non-denominational confirmation, and we advertise it as being as hard as it is, and it has become a bit of a right of passage for 8th grade students to complete. We cover 20 topics, one topic a week, and have quizzes on the material we go through, as well as a 'Final' examination at the end of the year.

Some of the topics covered include:

what is the bible?

what is god like?

what is the trinity?

what are angels, satan, &amp; demons?

what are justification and Sanctification?

what will happen when christ returns?

And although we use it as a Sunday Morning class, it could just as easily be a class that meets on a weeknight, or you could take our 4 week chunks to mix in with another curriculum.

You can download a sample of the first week to get an idea of what all is included with this great download, and then be sure to Pre-Order it! Full Package to be released in chunks beginning <strong>November 2nd!</strong>

<strong><a href="https://s3.amazonaws.com/YouthMin/Ben/Doctrine+Class/Sample.zip">Download Sample</a> </strong>

<span style="color: #808080;"><em>*There will be no download today when preordering. The complete package will be sent to you on November 2nd, but we will also be sending out resources ahead of then to help you promote this class to start in the spring semester!</em></span>

Most youth workers are acutely aware of the impact and reach social media can have for the gospel with teens, and we'd love to devote more time to utilizing this tool, but it's a lot.

This download sets you up for a greater reach, greater engagement, and ultimately, a far better utilization of social media for kingdom work. In 15 minutes, you can schedule out an entire month's worth of social media posts, and then supplement the schedule when you have a moment or inspiration. It's 30 days of killer content, with <strong>a mixture of image and video posts, that are designed to engage, inspire, connect, and grow your student</strong>s.

This download contains 30 ready to post images, and a 30 day posting schedule, or .50 a day for social content.
Tags: discipleship | images | plan | schedule | Social media | social media plan

It’s a mix of scripture, quotes, questions, and a few unique holiday celebrations thrown in, and we’ve laid it all out with suggested captions to post with images on what days. It’s a full plan for the month of December, so you can give it to any leader or student and have your social media game instantly get a big boost. Even though it’s laid out for December, you can use 90% of these images again or on any day of the year, although this calendar goes great in leading up to Christmas.

Name: 30 Day Instagram plan - September
3 Words or Less: Movie Edition
3 Words or Less: Christmas Movie Addition
Description:
How to Play “3 Words or Less”
The goal of the game is to guess the movie title before anyone else. We’ve provided you with 3 one word clues, but they won’t show up all at once. Every 5 seconds a new clue will reveal itself, so if you think you know the answer before the other people, buzz in and claim the point.

Once you hit the buzzer, the person running slides will pause the countdown(that way the person can’t stall while more clues are revealed) If you get it wrong you cannot score anymore, leaving the question open for someone else to steal the point.If the timer runs out(15 secs) than no one scores that round.

Set Up: You’ll need 2 or more combatants, a program that can run video presentation(powerpoint, pro presenter, proclaim, etc), and a buzzer(optional).

Side Note: This pairs well with the “Three Beautiful Words” series

Check out more products from Sam Pettersen here

2 Peter Small Group Series
Description:
This 3 week journey through 2 Peter challenges us to be prepared as followers of Christ in knowledge and grace against the false teachers of this world. There are many who say they are "Christians" that will tempt us with things of this world and we need to be prepared for these teachers and others who are not associated with Jesus, so that we make sure we don't fall. 2 Peter is full of challenges for us as followers of Christ and this small group series is perfect for students to dive into those challenges and stretch their faith. If you do Sunday School, this can be easily adapted with teaching guide in this resource!

Week 1 - 2 Peter 1: Grow in Faith
Week 2 - 2 Peter 2: Danger of False Teachers
Week 3 - 2 Peter 3: Day of the Lord is Coming

This resource includes:

Tags: faith | knowledge | prepare | small group questions | small groups | spiritual growth

Name: 17 Week Series: How To Stay Awesome
Description:
This youthmin.org exclusive series has what it takes to classify as a 'Super-Duper-Uber Mega Series!' Spanning the length of an entire semester (17 weeks), 'How To Stay Awesome' is a fun, practical, easy-to-apply exegetical study through the book of James. Each week believers will be challenged to make more of their faith, and unbelievers will be challenged to put their faith in Christ with an easy-to-understand evangelical appeal for each week.

This series covers topics such as Discipline, Perseverance, Temptation, Bullying, Evangelism, Cussing, Gossiping, Favoritism, and every thing else that can be found in the book of James! And instead of narrowing it down to a shorter series, I decided to include all 17 weeks, and allow you to pick and choose which weeks you want to teach on (or do all 17)! 17 lessons for $20...this deal can't be beat! :)

I have included the lessons for each week in .PDF, Word Doc, as well as Pages files. The verses for each week are .PNG files. I have also included the .PSD files to edit the sermon title screen as well as the Verse Template.

Have fun with this series, my students loved it!

Name: City-Wide Scavenger Hunt
Description: This is an event that works very well with high school students, but can also be done with junior high students with adult leaders of course. How we execute this event is, we put together teams of 4 students with 1 leader. Those teams take the list and try to do as many tasks on the list as possible before the time runs out. When the time runs out, all teams go back to the church to submit their pictures and videos to get points. Meanwhile, you should have refreshments and music as the students wait with suspense to find out who won. We gave our winners free coffee before our next service. The videos and pictures from the event make for GREAT social media promotion.
Excerpt: This is a complete guide to hosting a city-wide scavenger hunt with over 50 tasks included!

Name: The Code
Description:
In this series you will be receiving sermons, backgrounds, cellphone backgrounds, print-offs and much more.

The first week is all about honor, living a life of honor because we are honorable.

The second week is all about servanthood, we rule like servants and serve like kings.

The third week is all about revival, it's our lifestyle.

The fourth week is all about being greater, we will always make room for more.

The fifth week is all about integrity,  we are driven by eternity.

The sixth week is all about faith, the impossible is logical.

This sermon series is so great to go straight through, to have as one week sermons in between sermon series and to teach within small groups. The culture of the world has none of these but kingdom culture is surround by these 6 thoughts. I cannot wait for you to get your hands on this!
Excerpt: The Code is 6 week sermon series with 6 simple lifestyles that this generation needs to hear about.
Tags: faith | greater | honor | integrity | revival | servanthood
Notes: Thank you for supporting YouthChurch of Lubbock, TX. We pray that this message changes the direction of our youth ministry like it did ours.

Name: What is Life Sermon
Description: Approximately 53 million abortions have taken place since Roe V Wade in 1973. Our students need to know what God says about life, when it begins and how we should handle it. With this one off sermon and small group combo, you can generate some great God-centered conversations about this very relevant and important topic.
Excerpt:
One sermon on the topic of abortion.
Sermon Manuscript

Tags: Group Games | upfront game | youth group

Name: Rock, Paper, Scissors, You?
Description:
This is a great "Get to Know You" game for your group! Super easy: Have your group choose a partner, play a good ol' round of Rock, Paper, Scissors then look to the screen. Based on which action they chose, they have to ask the corresponding question to their partner. If there's a "loser" to the round, they have to answer the additional question at the bottom. If there's a draw, both people have to answer! Winners get to chill and don't have to answer an additional partner. After the round's over, find a new partner and repeat!

*NOTE: Please download the free font "All Things Must Pass" and make sure you have Helvetica to ensure the game looks its' best!
Excerpt: A classic game with a "Get to Know You" twist!

Description: Voices In My Head is a full night of programming resource designed for youth ministries to discuss the hard topics of worry, anxiety, stress, and depression with their students. This resource helps students see how to obtain the peace of God in the midst of a chaotic world.

Name: Summer 2020 Calendar PSD Template 8.5 X 11
Description:
This is a photoshop calendar that I have used for years to clearly show parents what's happening at a glance for the entire quarter.

This is sized to print on an 8.5 X 11 so your average church printer can't be but so upset with you.  We usually use an outside company so we can get them cheap with a gloss cover. This is a 1 sided calendar, however often we would put a devotional plan and or "looking ahead" events on the backside of the calendar.  I have been in many student's home and have seen this on their refridgerator!

Everything is labeled and organized within the photoshop calendar and the two fonts used were: 1) Myriad Pro and  2) Helvetica; I use some other ones when I use it personally but I wanted to use stock system fonts so your computers wouldn't yell at you too much.   You can quickly change the background pictures, or the color scheme etc.  I have edited the pictures myself, and or used royalty free pngs.

&nbsp;

You will need photoshop or an adobe suite product to open and edit this item.
Excerpt:
*8.5 x 11 Quarterly Calendar

*PSD Template

*Easy to Edit
Tags: admin | EASY | quarterly | summer | Summer Calendar
Notes:
Thanks for ordering the calendar!!!  If you have any questions feel free to email me personally at AndyLynn84@gmail.com.

Blessings to you as you help people fall in love with Jesus.

- Andy

Name: Clarity 20/20
Description:

Clarity is a 4 week series.
